review_data.title: Ein Traum von einem Café
review_data.content: Hervorragendes Frühstück - toller Service und der Kuchen, ein absoluter Traum 😍Ein bezauberndes Café. Wir kommen gern wieder.

review_data.title: Quaint quirky delicious reasonably priced
review_data.content: A wonderful quaint and quirky little cafe in Zurich serving a delicious international selection. We came for breakfast and they even had full English Breakfast and Mamosas! The owner was a lovely lady super friendly and sweet. The food was divine and the atmosphere non-pretentious...More

review_data.title: Great brunch

review_data.title: Best in the city
review_data.content: Denise and team are very gently and attentive. Best coffee and cakes in the city home made! Breakfast and bunch is fantastic and balanced, not to mention the great lunch offering. Thank you Denis and good luck, Diego

review_data.title: Leckeres Essen und ein tolles Team

review_data.title: Sehr zu empfehlen

review_data.title: Great Brunch Spot

review_data.title: Sunday brunch

review_data.title: Great little find with good food at great prices

review_data.title: Very nice breakfast

review_data.title: British brunch? Why not
review_data.content: A very nice brunch place: not fancy but with character. Friendly staff and an interesting menu make a good combination for a lazy morning. If you are british, this place is likely a must.
